EmailTemplate.name: Exam fail notification - RBS Law Review
EmailTemplate.subject: You didn’t pass the {!Education_History__c.License_Type__c} Law Review exam.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're sorry to tell you that you didn’t pass the {!Education_History__c.License_Type__c} Law Review exam you sent us on {!Education_History__c.Scheduled_Date__c}.
The required score was {!Education_History__c.Exam_Required_Score__c}.
Your score was {!Education_History__c.Score__c}.
You missed questions related to the following laws and rules:
RCW: [RCW #] WAC: [WAC #]
Please correct your exam, sign and date it, and return it to us.
Questions? Need help? {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov APP017
